trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs> class provides the data needed for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate> event.
Custom authentication schemes for a Web site use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to indicate whether a user's login attempt succeeded.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs"></xref> class with the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated"></xref> property set to `false`.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs"></xref> class.
`true` if the user is authenticated; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets a value indicating whether a user's authentication attempt succeeded.

Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property in custom authentication schemes implemented in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.Authenticate?displayProperty=fullName> event handler to indicate the success or failure of the user's login attempt.

Setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> property to `false` indicates that the Web site user has not presented valid credentials and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control should raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginError> event in addition to displaying text that indicates the login attempt was not successful.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoginError> event enables the page developer to have additional processes or action occur when user authentication is not successful.

Setting <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AuthenticateEventArgs.Authenticated%2A> to `true` indicates that the user has presented valid credentials and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login> control should raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.LoggedIn> event and redirect the user back to the current page or to the page indicated by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Login.DestinationPageUrl%2A>.
`true` if the authentication attempt succeeded; otherwise, `false`.
